headline: Nasdaq Halts Pitanium Limited
summary: NEW YORK, Oct. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Nasdaq Stock Market® (Nasdaq: NDAQ) announced that trading is halted in Pitanium Limited (Nasdaq: PTNM) for additional information requested from the company. Previously, the Securities and Exchange Commission effected a trading suspension in PTNM from 04:00:00 on October 6, 2025 to 23:59:00 on October 17, 2025. The last sale price of the company’s ordinary shares was $10.39. More information about the SEC’s order can be found at https://www.sec.go
